org.pac4j.http.client

Class BaseHttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.util.InitializableObject
      • org.pac4j.core.client.BaseClient<UsernamePasswordCredentials,HttpProfile>
        • org.pac4j.http.client.BaseHttpClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Client<UsernamePasswordCredentials,HttpProfile>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicAuthClient, FormClient

    public abstract class BaseHttpClient
extends BaseClient<UsernamePasswordCredentials,HttpProfile>
    This class is the base HTTP client to authenticate users through HTTP protocol.

    The username and password inputs must be retrieved through HTTP protocol.

    To validate credentials, an UsernamePasswordAuthenticator must be defined through the setUsernamePasswordAuthenticator(UsernamePasswordAuthenticator) method.

    To create the profile, a ProfileCreator must be defined through the setProfileCreator(ProfileCreator) method.

    It returns a HttpProfile.

    Since:
    1.4.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu
    See Also:
    HttpProfile
